articles.author: Rebecca Shabad
articles.title: Fauci warns reopening states: 'You can't just leap over things' - NBCNews.com
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci said Thursday that states that are reopening their economies or states that are considering taking that action soon “can’t just leap over things” and get into a situation where the coronavirus makes a rebound in that region.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Dr. Anthony Fauci said Thursday that states reopening their economies "can't just leap over things" that would potentially allow the coronavirus to rebound.

articles.title: NFL Commissioner Gives Up His $40 Million Salary And Will Cut League Employees' Pay - NPR
articles.description: The news of Roger Goodell's pay cut came as an internal league memo announced executive salary reductions and furloughs of league employees. He said coronavirus-control disruptions are to blame.
articles.content:
NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell, seen during last week's league draft, is cutting his salary, along with those of league employees who make over $100,000.
NFL via AP
NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell, who was slated to make up to $40 million this year, decided … [+2437 chars]

articles.title: Cardinals, Red Sox, Cubs among MLB teams offering refunds - ESPN
articles.description: A day after MLB told teams they could decide their own ticket refund policies, the Cubs, Cardinals and Red Sox announced their plans for games not played through May.
